zh-cn: 贝尼托·阿米尔卡雷·安德烈亚·墨索里尼

description.zh-cn: 意大利政治家、记者，国家法西斯党领袖，法西斯主义创始人。他于1922年至1943年担任意大利王国首相，1943年至1945年担任意大利社会共和国的国家元首。
description.en: Italian politician and journalist who founded and led the National Fascist Party. He was Prime Minister of Italy from 1922 to 1943 and Duce of the Italian Social Republic from 1943 to 1945.

nodes.id: 维托里奥·埃马努埃莱三世

zh-cn: 维托里奥·埃马努埃莱三世

description.zh-cn: 意大利王国国王，在向罗马进军后任命墨索里尼为首相，后于1943年将其解职并逮捕。
description.en: King of Italy who appointed Mussolini as Prime Minister after the March on Rome, and later dismissed and arrested him in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 意大利政治家，在墨索里尼通过向罗马进军上台前的最后一任意大利首相。
description.en: Italian politician, he was the last Prime Minister of Italy before the dictatorship of Benito Mussolini.

description.zh-cn: 意大利陆军元帅和政治家，在1943年墨索里尼被捕后接替他出任总理。
description.en: Italian general and statesman who became Prime Minister after Mussolini's arrest in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治人物，纳粹党领袖，纳粹德国元首。他是墨索里尼在二战中的主要盟友。
description.en: German politician, leader of the Nazi Party, and Führer of Nazi Germany. He was Mussolini's main ally during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 贝尼托·墨索里尼的情妇，1945年与墨索里尼一同被游击队俘虏并处决。
description.en: Benito Mussolini's mistress, who was captured and executed alongside him by partisans in 1945.

description.zh-cn: 意大利的一个左翼政党，墨索里尼早年曾是其党员，后因主战立场被开除。
description.en: A left-wing political party in Italy of which Mussolini was an early member before being expelled for his pro-war stance.

description.zh-cn: 由墨索里尼于1921年建立的政党，是法西斯意大利的执政党。
description.en: The political party founded by Mussolini in 1921, which ruled Fascist Italy.

description.zh-cn: 在墨索里尼被希特勒救出后，于意大利社会共和国时期创建的法西斯政党。
description.en: The fascist party created during the Italian Social Republic period after Mussolini was rescued by Hitler.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战末期由墨索里尼在希特勒协助下于意大利北部建立的德国傀儡政权。
description.en: A German puppet state established by Mussolini in northern Italy with Hitler's assistance during the later part of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 一场由墨索里尼领导的政变，导致国家法西斯党在意大利取得政权。
description.en: A coup d'état led by Mussolini that resulted in the National Fascist Party's seizure of power in Italy.

nodes.id: 第二次义大利—衣索比亚战争

zh-cn: 第二次义大利—衣索比亚战争

description.zh-cn: 法西斯意大利发动的殖民战争，旨在吞并埃塞俄比亚帝国。
description.en: A colonial war initiated by Fascist Italy with the aim of annexing the Ethiopian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 位于现今埃塞俄比亚和厄立特里亚地区的帝国，在第二次意阿战争中被意大利侵占。
description.en: An empire in the area of modern-day Ethiopia and Eritrea, invaded and occupied by Italy in the Second Italo-Ethiopian War.

description.zh-cn: 国家法西斯党的最高机关，于1943年7月通过对墨索里尼的不信任动议，导致其下台。
description.en: The main body of Mussolini's Fascist government, which passed a vote of no confidence in him in July 1943, leading to his ousting.

description.zh-cn: 由迪诺·格兰迪在法西斯大委员会会议上提出的对墨索里尼的不信任动议。
description.en: A motion of no confidence against Mussolini presented by Dino Grandi at the meeting of the Grand Council of Fascism.

description.zh-cn: 德国特种部队执行的一次军事营救行动，将在大萨索山被软禁的墨索里尼成功救出。
description.en: A military rescue operation conducted by German special forces to free the imprisoned Mussolini from the Gran Sasso.

description.zh-cn: 由意大利共产党领导的游击队组织，其成员在1945年俘虏并处决了墨索里尼。
description.en: Partisan units organized by the Italian Communist Party, whose members captured and executed Mussolini in 1945.

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼和他的情人克拉拉·贝塔西被意大利共产党游击队员枪决的事件。
description.en: The event in which Mussolini and his mistress Clara Petacci were summarily executed by Italian communist partisans.

description.zh-cn: 由阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治下的德国，是法西斯意大利在第二次世界大战中的主要盟友。
description.en: Germany under the rule of Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party, the primary ally of Fascist Italy in World War II.

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼在1922年至1943年期间统治的国家。
description.en: The state that Mussolini ruled from 1922 to 1943.

description.zh-cn: 贝尼托·墨索里尼的父亲，一名铁匠和社会主义活动家。
description.en: Father of Benito Mussolini, a blacksmith and socialist activist.

description.zh-cn: 贝尼托·墨索里尼的第一任妻子。
description.en: Benito Mussolini's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 贝尼托·墨索里尼的第二任妻子。
description.en: Benito Mussolini's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼早年是意大利社会党成员，后因支持意大利参加一战而被开除。
description.en: Mussolini was an early member of the Italian Socialist Party but was expelled in 1914 for his support of Italy's intervention in WWI.

description.zh-cn: 1921年，墨索里尼建立了国家法西斯党。
description.en: In 1921, Mussolini founded the National Fascist Party.

description.zh-cn: 向罗马进军事件迫使意大利国王任命墨索里尼为首相，使其成功夺取政权。
description.en: The March on Rome compelled the King of Italy to appoint Mussolini as Prime Minister, allowing him to seize power.

relationships.source: 维托里奥·埃马努埃莱三世

description.zh-cn: 在向罗马进军后，国王维托里奥·埃马努埃莱三世任命墨索里尼为首相。
description.en: After the March on Rome, King Victor Emmanuel III appointed Mussolini as Prime Minister.

relationships.target: 维托里奥·埃马努埃莱三世

description.zh-cn: 作为意大利王国首相，墨索里尼在名义上对国王维托里奥·埃马努埃莱三世负责。
description.en: As Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Italy, Mussolini was nominally subordinate to King Victor Emmanuel III.

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼接替路易吉·法克塔成为意大利首相。
description.en: Mussolini succeeded Luigi Facta as Prime Minister of Italy.

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼被解职后，佩特罗·巴多格里奥接替他成为意大利总理。
description.en: After Mussolini was dismissed, Pietro Badoglio succeeded him as Prime Minister of Italy.

relationships.target: 第二次义大利—衣索比亚战争

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼发动了第二次意阿战争，旨在将埃塞俄比亚变为意大利的殖民地。
description.en: Mussolini launched the Second Italo-Ethiopian War with the goal of turning Ethiopia into an Italian colony.

relationships.source: 第二次义大利—衣索比亚战争

description.zh-cn: 意大利军队入侵并占领了埃塞俄比亚帝国。
description.en: Italian forces invaded and occupied the Ethiopian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼与希特勒是政治盟友，共同组建了轴心国联盟。
description.en: Mussolini and Hitler were political allies who formed the Axis powers.

description.zh-cn: 法西斯大委员会通过了对墨索里尼的不信任动议，即格兰迪决议，直接导致其下台。
description.en: The Grand Council of Fascism's passage of the Order of the Day Grandi, a vote of no confidence, directly led to Mussolini's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 1943年7月25日，法西斯大委员会投票通过了格兰迪决议，剥夺了墨索里尼的权力。
description.en: On July 25, 1943, the Grand Council of Fascism voted to pass the Order of the Day Grandi, stripping Mussolini of his power.

relationships.source: 维托里奥·埃马努埃莱三世

description.zh-cn: 在法西斯大委员会投票后，国王维托里奥·埃马努埃莱三世下令逮捕墨索里尼并解除其职务。
description.en: Following the vote by the Grand Council of Fascism, King Victor Emmanuel III ordered Mussolini's arrest and dismissal from office.

description.zh-cn: 德国发动的橡树行动将墨索里尼从囚禁中解救出来。
description.en: Operation Oak, launched by Germany, rescued Mussolini from his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 希特勒下令执行橡树行动以营救被软禁的墨索里尼。
description.en: Hitler ordered Operation Oak to rescue the imprisoned Mussolini.

description.zh-cn: 被救出后，墨索里尼在希特勒的协助下于意大利北部建立了意大利社会共和国。
description.en: After his rescue, Mussolini, with Hitler's assistance, established the Italian Social Republic in northern Italy.

description.zh-cn: 意大利社会共和国是德国的傀儡政权，完全受纳粹德国控制。
description.en: The Italian Social Republic was a German puppet state, completely controlled by Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 1945年4月27日，墨索里尼在逃亡途中被意大利共产党游击队加里波第旅俘虏。
description.en: On April 27, 1945, Mussolini was captured by the communist partisans of the Garibaldi Brigades while attempting to flee.

description.zh-cn: 俘虏墨索里尼的游击队员在次日执行了对他的处决。
description.en: The partisans who captured Mussolini executed him the following day.

description.zh-cn: 1945年4月28日，墨索里尼被枪决。
description.en: On April 28, 1945, Mussolini was executed by firing squad.

description.zh-cn: 墨索里尼的情人克拉拉·贝塔西与他一同被处决。
description.en: Mussolini's mistress, Clara Petacci, was executed alongside him.

description.zh-cn: 克拉拉·贝塔西是墨索里尼的情妇，直到两人一同被处决。
description.en: Clara Petacci was Mussolini's mistress until their joint execution.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山德罗·墨索里尼是贝尼托·墨索里尼的父亲。
description.en: Alessandro Mussolini was the father of Benito Mussolini.

description.zh-cn: 伊达·达尔塞是墨索里尼的第一任妻子。
description.en: Ida Dalser was Mussolini's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 雷切尔·墨索里尼是墨索里尼的第二任妻子。
description.en: Rachele Mussolini was Mussolini's second wife.
